entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
